body: I wish all the retards on the comments would use their brain. The author intended for daeho to be much younger, but scraped that idea to avoid the recent censorship laws in many countries condemning lolicon/ shotacon hentai.
Istg the mc is such an idiot
Ignore the conversation, fap to the art.
The mc is meant to be younger, the author made him 20 yo to avoid censorship.
The plot may be sorta bad but the girls have great ye know
Someone please just stop these bitches, they're getting out of the line
Damn, still got cut... F, author... he better be doing it with her step-mom on the next chapter!!!!
The art is so fucking god
These characters may be kinda retarded but the art is fucking great

Jesus the story is so bad why does it even exist? Even if the Author deleted all the story and just showed the sex scenes it would be 10x better. Mc is an autistic retard, his friend is an autistic retard, every character is an autistic retard who can't understand anything. Aunt tries to teach him about masturbation by... Masturbating him.... Great aunt 200iq. Guy doesn't even know what sex is at the age of 20, his 20 year old friend takes 
panties from his sister like he is a 10 year old. Mc's sister is the person with the highest iq here. At least i think her iq could be higher than 0. She actually teaches him a bit , although she also has sex with him because saying 'no jesus christ fuck off' is something everyone is incapable of in this series. The only way to enjoy this is to skip to the sex scenes and skip all the dialogue as well. Art is decent.
Crap plot, great art, 8/10 would definitely recommend LOOKING at it. Also I hope there is more of his adoptive older sister. I like her the most.
My vibe coming from the mc is like “mommy, i piss and shit my undies, can you change it for me by yourself?” I feel bad for him though...
This far in and the best sister hasn't even been used yet smh
Damn this mc is too innocent i feel bad for this boy
Yoo, why tf is the mc retarded? He's 20 and doesnt what sex is...... also why tf do the translations keep switching every chapter, I dont have a problem with it kinda but wtf
This is not up to the ch 38, maybe 36 or 35, as I'm sure I already read everything up to this point some weeks ago in Spanish till ch 37
Man, this author can draw women ... I don't care about the paperthin plot or the bad grammar. 9/10 visuals; without censoring it'd be a 10.
Buckle up, the next 4 chapters are going to be good with this top tier milf based on the raws already out.
Age 20, doesn’t know what masterbation is let alone sex. The grammar is so fucking awful I’m amazing day it isn’t one of the tags.
